dialogue.title: Compendium2Module
dialogue.content: Do you want to download this compendium as a module?

errors.moduleJsonFailed: Failed to load required module files.
errors.openCompendiumFailed: Could not find or open compendium path.
errors.compendiumLoadingFailed: Failed to load compendium data for compendium %s.

edit.title: Configure Export
edit.description: Here you can modify the different aspects of the compendium module, like the id, display name or author. If no change is made, the default values will be used.
